name: Dash Dash Run!
description: Dash Dash Run! The frantic VR arcade runner that has you pumping those arms, performing to the crowd, and racing at crazy speeds across a wild selection of vibrant courses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Core i5 3570k or the AMD FX 6300 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any Windows supported soundcard
